page.title: 02FORRES EAST TRANSPORT
page.content: The main feature of this block is the A96,which runs through the middle of this block.To the East it passes through Elgin and other towns and ends up in Aberdeen.To the West it runs to Inverness and various other towns.Although the railway station isn't in the Eastern area of Forres.It is one of the main features of the town and part of the railway runs through the East of Forres.There are various bus services between Kinloss, Elgin and Forres. There is also a bus service going to and from {Leanchoil {Hospital.} Also coming from the A96 will be a by pass which should be taken round the north side of Forres. The reason for the by pass is that in summer the centre of the town gets packed with traffic and also because it is very narrow.
